Sure enough, the Mafia were blinded temporarily by this. But Monster thrust
his arm forward, which was Beholder 2, and the optic on it, the huge round
one, watched the scene for him. He moved in front of his comrades until
their vision cleared....
----- Original Message -----
From: <kinger01030@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, November 19, 2000 12:42 PM
Subject: War-comm to all council


> War heard the message. He sent out a comm coded to all the council members
> at the battle. "Put down your visors or close your eyes now!!!!!!!" he
sent a
> solar flare grenade. It should take out the alliance's optics for a few
> secinds. no matter where they stood the alliance members would be affected
at
> least a little. He pulled down his visor as the flare went off.
>
>
>
>
